data.name: 13:ORIGIN - Chapter One
data.detailed_description:
The story continues where it left off..

After reading his father's letter, psychologist Edmond, who is locked in his room by his most dangerous (and smartest) patient, manages to get out of the room by solving clever puzzles. He realizes that this story is deeper and sets out to reveal the secrets. While revealing all the secrets one by one, Edmond's story, which also reveals many unknowns about his past, will terrify you as much as himself.

This sequel to what happened in the 13:ORIGIN - Prologue promises you puzzles, secrets and deep wounds about the past.
data.about_the_game:
The story continues where it left off..

After reading his father's letter, psychologist Edmond, who is locked in his room by his most dangerous (and smartest) patient, manages to get out of the room by solving clever puzzles. He realizes that this story is deeper and sets out to reveal the secrets. While revealing all the secrets one by one, Edmond's story, which also reveals many unknowns about his past, will terrify you as much as himself.

This sequel to what happened in the 13:ORIGIN - Prologue promises you puzzles, secrets and deep wounds about the past.
data.short_description: Unknowingly revealing a great secret about human history, will Edmond be able to live with this secret? 13:ORIGIN is a story-based adventure and puzzle game full of suspense and excitement, where you can progress by solving puzzles. Here is the first chapter of the journey.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 1024MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
